t: Is buying a skateboard from Amazon (either complete or just parts) worth it? - Quora
s: Answer: My current board is almost entirely made from parts from either Amazon or eBay. My branded trucks were £15 on Amazon (discontinued model), instead of about £75 elsewhere. Bushings, risers, grip tape, rails, skate tool and bolts were all Amazon. Generally with free delivery. My deck was ...
